name: Chipax Inc.
description: Developer of a web application designed to organize finances in an efficient way. The company automates processes and carries out the operation in an orderly and transparent way, connecting sales and purchase invoices, expenses, fees, remuneration, and taxes to a checking account to keep total control, enabling businesses to manage their cash flow and other financial statements.
one_liner: Developer of a web application designed to organize finances in an efficient way. The company automates processes and carries out the operation in an orderly and transparent way, connecting sales and purchase invoices, expenses, fees, remuneration, and taxes to a checking account to keep total control, enabling businesses to manage their cash flow and other financial statements.

name: Contalink Inc.
description: Developer of a SaaS-based web accounting automation platform designed to provide all the financial information. The company's platform is used for accounting, finance, and administration to comply with the requirements of an office such as taxation, reducing operational costs, eliminating license costs and other related accounts, enabling accountants to reduce costs and generate new sources of income.

name: HAPPY FINANCES FOR ALL, LLC
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to manage the expenses and income of the businesses. The company's platform offers payment, billing options, a self-billing portal, monitoring, and stamping invoices, helping professionals, startups, and small and medium enterprises with a simplified application programming interface that is enough to create an invoice, a payment link, or a sales receipt.

name: Wihom Software LLC
description: Financial operations automation platform for reconciliation, commission calculations, using no-code set up.
one_liner: Financial operations automation platform for reconciliation, commission calculations, using no-code set up.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Accounting, Ecommerce, FinTech, SaaS

name: LedgiFi LLC.
description: Developer of a portfolio tracking platform intended to simplify cryptocurrency taxes. The company's platform specializes in syncing transactions, analyzing portfolios, and computing capital gains so users can be tax-compliant and makes the process of managing investments easy and appealing by tracking all assets, comparing investment alternatives, optimizing taxes, and allowing to share portfolios with friends, enabling people to grow their wealth and save the process of calculating payments.

name: MLNETWORKSIO,INC.
description: MLNetworks helps Telcos to design, operate and optimize their networks more intelligently through an end-to-end data platform.
one_liner: MLNetworks helps Telcos to design, operate and optimize their networks more intelligently through an end-to-end data platform.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Accounting, Data & Analytics, SaaS, Telecommunications

name: BEYOND BORDERS LTD
description: OCTA helps businesses collect invoice payments faster with AI-powered automation, financing, and debt recovery.
one_liner: OCTA helps businesses collect invoice payments faster with AI-powered automation, financing, and debt recovery.

name: Qentaz LLC
description: Qentaz is a SaaS+Payment platform that streamlines last-mile payment and reconciliation operations.
one_liner: Qentaz is a SaaS+Payment platform that streamlines last-mile payment and reconciliation operations.

name: Taxo app LLC
description: Developer of taxation software designed to create a tailored system for accountants. The company's software specializes in offering taxation, tracking, automation, and communication tools, and a client terminal as well as shares tax reports and invoices, and triggers email alerts, enabling accountants to communicate with their colleagues and clients and manage their work.
